thread.title: Selma Blair wants role in ‘Cruel Intentions’ reboot
thread.title_full: Selma Blair wants role in ‘Cruel Intentions’ reboot

title: Selma Blair wants role in ‘Cruel Intentions’ reboot
text:
Selma Blair wants role in ‘Cruel Intentions’ reboot 
Fox News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Actresses Selma Blair (L) and Sarah Michelle Gellar, co-stars of the film "Cruel Intentions" pose with their award for Best Screen Kiss at the 2000 MTV Movie Awards taping, June 3 in Los Angeles. The awards show will be telecast on the MTV Network June 8 in the United States. - RTXJS64...
